mapper.delete: delete from T_BSS_PRMS_PACKAGE_FIRST_AUDIT where PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_BSS_PRMS_REVIEW_FIRST_AUDIT (PROJECT_ID, FIRST_AUDIT_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, IS_PASS, PACKAGE_ID) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstAuditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPass,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

PROJECT_ID,
FIRST_AUDIT_ID,

IS_PASS,
